title: 3 bedrooms for rent
posting_body: This 3 story condo has been meticulously maintained.
Beautiful ceramic floors greet you as you enter into a spacious light and bright first floor living room with large windows.
You will seamlessly work your way through a spacious dining room into a beautiful kitchen with stainless steel appliances.
The second level offers a nice sized bedroom along with a large family room and a full bathroom.
The 3rd floor has newly installed hardwood floors with a lovely master bedroom, a bathroom  with a shower and  another bedroom.
Other features include gas heat, central air conditioning, newly installed storm windows, a beautiful outdoor patio, plenty of closet space throughout, and a 3 cars parking space.
This unit is close to many establishments, with easy access to many highways and a short walk to the commuter rail.
Looking for a tenant starting September 1st (willing to start few days earlier if needed) at a price of $2950/mo.
